message: Let's split it evenly!  Fair is fair, right?
You started with an even split, now it's my turn to make a slightly uneven one. I'll give you a small share, but I'll take the majority.
Okay, I see you're playing it tough.  Let's compromise a little.  I'm willing to take a slightly smaller share to get this over with.
You're willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to give up much. I'll take the lion's share, but it's still a good deal for you.
This is getting ridiculous!  I'm not going to let you walk all over me.  This is my final offer - take it or leave it!
